PATIENT_ID: TEST_OSTEO_002
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-01-15 08:00:00

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-01-15 10:00:00
Left tibia fracture managed with external fixation.
Wound clean, no signs of infection.
Soft tissue healing well.

[IMAGING] 2026-01-18 09:00:00
X-ray left tibia: Fracture alignment maintained.
Hardware in good position. No periosteal reaction.
